actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a deduction for certain expenses of repair and maintenance of a home owned by a taxpayer who has attained the age of 65.

summary.text: Allows tax deduction under the Internal Revenue Code for expenses incurred for the repair and maintenance of a home owned by a taxpayer who has attained the age of 65. Limits such deductions to $500 in any calendar year. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 218)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a deduction for certain expenses of repair and maintenance of a home owned by a taxpayer who has attained the age of 65.
